alert.note: Alert for Howard; Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 22 at 4:26PM EDT until May 22 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR WESTERN HOWARD AND NORTHEASTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Germantown, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Germantown, Gaithersburg, Olney, Damascus, Montgomery Village, Redland, Boyds, Cloverly, Clarksburg, Burtonsville, Spencerville, Highland, Washington Grove, Laytonsville, Brookeville, Ednor, Ashton, Dayton, Poplar Springs and Roxbury Mills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
